column1: President  through  the  Minister,  within  three  months  of  the

7(2)(iv) 
  The  Bhikku  recommended  by 
the  Uththarithara

Sabhawa  shall  be  appointed  by 
the  President  as 
the
Mahopadayaya of the university for a period of three years.
No  Bhikku  shall  be  appointed  as  Mahopadayaya  of  the
university for more than two consecutive terms.
